37#include <drm/drmP.h>
38#include <drm/drm_crtc.h>
39#include <drm/drm_fourcc.h>
40#include <drm/drm_rect.h>
41#include <drm/drm_atomic.h>
42#include <drm/drm_plane_helper.h>

48static bool
49format_is_yuv(uint32_t format)
50{
51 switch (format) {
52 case DRM_FORMAT_YUYV:
53 case DRM_FORMAT_UYVY:
54 case DRM_FORMAT_VYUY:
55 case DRM_FORMAT_YVYU:
56 return true;
57 default:
58 return false;
59 }
60}
61
62static int usecs_to_scanlines(const struct drm_display_mode *adjusted_mode,
63 int usecs)
64{
65 /* paranoia */
66 if (!adjusted_mode->crtc_htotal)
67 return 1;
68
69 return DIV_ROUND_UP(usecs * adjusted_mode->crtc_clock,
70 1000 * adjusted_mode->crtc_htotal);
71}
72
73/**
74 * intel_pipe_update_start() - start update of a set of display registers
75 * @crtc: the crtc of which the registers are going to be updated
76 * @start_vbl_count: vblank counter return pointer used for error checking
77 *
78 * Mark the start of an update to pipe registers that should be updated
79 * atomically regarding vblank. If the next vblank will happens within
80 * the next 100 us, this function waits until the vblank passes.
81 *
82 * After a successful call to this function, interrupts will be disabled
83 * until a subsequent call to intel_pipe_update_end(). That is done to
84 * avoid random delays. The value written to @start_vbl_count should be
85 * supplied to intel_pipe_update_end() for error checking.
86 */
87void intel_pipe_update_start(struct intel_crtc *crtc)
88{
89 struct drm_device *dev = crtc->base.dev;
90 const struct drm_display_mode *adjusted_mode = &crtc->config->base.adjusted_mode;
91 enum i915_pipe pipe = crtc->pipe;
92 long timeout = msecs_to_jiffies_timeout(1);
93 int scanline, min, max, vblank_start;
94#ifdef __NetBSD__
95 drm_waitqueue_t *wq = drm_crtc_vblank_waitqueue(&crtc->base);
96 int ret;
97#else
98 wait_queue_head_t *wq = drm_crtc_vblank_waitqueue(&crtc->base);
99 DEFINE_WAIT(wait);
100#endif
101
102 vblank_start = adjusted_mode->crtc_vblank_start;
103 if (adjusted_mode->flags & DRM_MODE_FLAG_INTERLACE)
104 vblank_start = DIV_ROUND_UP(vblank_start, 2);
105
106 /* FIXME needs to be calibrated sensibly */
107 min = vblank_start - usecs_to_scanlines(adjusted_mode, 100);
108 max = vblank_start - 1;
109
110#ifdef __NetBSD__
111 spin_lock(&dev->vbl_lock);
112#else
113 local_irq_disable();
114#endif
115
116 if (min <= 0 || max <= 0)
117 return;
118
119 if (WARN_ON(drm_crtc_vblank_get_locked(&crtc->base)))
120 return;
121
122 crtc->debug.min_vbl = min;
123 crtc->debug.max_vbl = max;
124 trace_i915_pipe_update_start(crtc);
125
126#ifdef __NetBSD__
127 DRM_SPIN_TIMED_WAIT_UNTIL(ret, wq, &dev->vbl_lock, timeout,
128 (scanline = intel_get_crtc_scanline(crtc),
129 scanline < min || scanline > max));
130 if (ret <= 0)
131 DRM_ERROR("Potential atomic update failure on pipe %c: %d\n",
132 pipe_name(crtc->pipe), ret ? ret : -EWOULDBLOCK);
133 drm_crtc_vblank_put_locked(&crtc->base);
134#else
135 for (;;) {
136 /*
137 * prepare_to_wait() has a memory barrier, which guarantees
138 * other CPUs can see the task state update by the time we
139 * read the scanline.
140 */
141 prepare_to_wait(wq, &wait, TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
142
143 scanline = intel_get_crtc_scanline(crtc);
144 if (scanline < min || scanline > max)
145 break;
146
147 if (timeout <= 0) {
148 DRM_ERROR("Potential atomic update failure on pipe %c\n",
149 pipe_name(crtc->pipe));
150 break;
151 }
152
153 local_irq_enable();
154
155 timeout = schedule_timeout(timeout);
156
157 local_irq_disable();
158 }
159
160 finish_wait(wq, &wait);
161
162 drm_crtc_vblank_put(&crtc->base);
163#endif
164
165 crtc->debug.scanline_start = scanline;
166 crtc->debug.start_vbl_time = ktime_get();
167 crtc->debug.start_vbl_count =
168 dev->driver->get_vblank_counter(dev, pipe);
169
170 trace_i915_pipe_update_vblank_evaded(crtc);
171}
172
173/**
174 * intel_pipe_update_end() - end update of a set of display registers
175 * @crtc: the crtc of which the registers were updated
176 * @start_vbl_count: start vblank counter (used for error checking)
177 *
178 * Mark the end of an update started with intel_pipe_update_start(). This
179 * re-enables interrupts and verifies the update was actually completed
180 * before a vblank using the value of @start_vbl_count.
181 */
182void intel_pipe_update_end(struct intel_crtc *crtc)
183{
184 struct drm_device *dev = crtc->base.dev;
185 enum i915_pipe pipe = crtc->pipe;
186 int scanline_end = intel_get_crtc_scanline(crtc);
187 u32 end_vbl_count = dev->driver->get_vblank_counter(dev, pipe);
188 ktime_t end_vbl_time = ktime_get();
189
190 trace_i915_pipe_update_end(crtc, end_vbl_count, scanline_end);
191
192#ifdef __NetBSD__
193 spin_unlock(&dev->vbl_lock);
194#else
195 local_irq_enable();
196#endif
197
198 if (crtc->debug.start_vbl_count &&
199 crtc->debug.start_vbl_count != end_vbl_count) {
200 DRM_ERROR("Atomic update failure on pipe %c (start=%u end=%u) time %"PRIdMAX" us, min %d, max %d, scanline start %d, end %d\n",
201 pipe_name(pipe), crtc->debug.start_vbl_count,
202 end_vbl_count,
203 ktime_us_delta(end_vbl_time, crtc->debug.start_vbl_time),
204 crtc->debug.min_vbl, crtc->debug.max_vbl,
205 crtc->debug.scanline_start, scanline_end);
206 }
207}
208
209static void
210skl_update_plane(struct drm_plane *drm_plane, struct drm_crtc *crtc,
211 struct drm_framebuffer *fb,
212 int crtc_x, int crtc_y,
213 unsigned int crtc_w, unsigned int crtc_h,
214 uint32_t x, uint32_t y,
215 uint32_t src_w, uint32_t src_h)
216{
217 struct drm_device *dev = drm_plane->dev;
218 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
219 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(drm_plane);
220 struct drm_i915_gem_object *obj = intel_fb_obj(fb);
221 const int pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
222 const int plane = intel_plane->plane + 1;
223 u32 plane_ctl, stride_div, stride;
224 int pixel_size = drm_format_plane_cpp(fb->pixel_format, 0);
225 const struct drm_intel_sprite_colorkey *key =
226 &to_intel_plane_state(drm_plane->state)->ckey;
227 u32 surf_addr;
228 u32 tile_height, plane_offset, plane_size;
229 unsigned int rotation;
230 int x_offset, y_offset;
231 struct intel_crtc_state *crtc_state = to_intel_crtc(crtc)->config;
232 int scaler_id;
233
234 plane_ctl = PLANE_CTL_ENABLE |
235 PLANE_CTL_PIPE_GAMMA_ENABLE |
236 PLANE_CTL_PIPE_CSC_ENABLE;
237
238 plane_ctl |= skl_plane_ctl_format(fb->pixel_format);
239 plane_ctl |= skl_plane_ctl_tiling(fb->modifier[0]);
240
241 rotation = drm_plane->state->rotation;
242 plane_ctl |= skl_plane_ctl_rotation(rotation);
243
244 intel_update_sprite_watermarks(drm_plane, crtc, src_w, src_h,
245 pixel_size, true,
246 src_w != crtc_w || src_h != crtc_h);
247
248 stride_div = intel_fb_stride_alignment(dev, fb->modifier[0],
249 fb->pixel_format);
250
251 scaler_id = to_intel_plane_state(drm_plane->state)->scaler_id;
252
253 /* Sizes are 0 based */
254 src_w--;
255 src_h--;
256 crtc_w--;
257 crtc_h--;
258
259 if (key->flags) {
260 I915_WRITE(PLANE_KEYVAL(pipe, plane), key->min_value);
261 I915_WRITE(PLANE_KEYMAX(pipe, plane), key->max_value);
262 I915_WRITE(PLANE_KEYMSK(pipe, plane), key->channel_mask);
263 }
264
265 if (key->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_DESTINATION)
266 plane_ctl |= PLANE_CTL_KEY_ENABLE_DESTINATION;
267 else if (key->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_SOURCE)
268 plane_ctl |= PLANE_CTL_KEY_ENABLE_SOURCE;
269
270 surf_addr = intel_plane_obj_offset(intel_plane, obj, 0);
271
272 if (intel_rotation_90_or_270(rotation)) {
273 /* stride: Surface height in tiles */
274 tile_height = intel_tile_height(dev, fb->pixel_format,
275 fb->modifier[0], 0);
276 stride = DIV_ROUND_UP(fb->height, tile_height);
277 plane_size = (src_w << 16) | src_h;
278 x_offset = stride * tile_height - y - (src_h + 1);
279 y_offset = x;
280 } else {
281 stride = fb->pitches[0] / stride_div;
282 plane_size = (src_h << 16) | src_w;
283 x_offset = x;
284 y_offset = y;
285 }
286 plane_offset = y_offset << 16 | x_offset;
287
288 I915_WRITE(PLANE_OFFSET(pipe, plane), plane_offset);
289 I915_WRITE(PLANE_STRIDE(pipe, plane), stride);
290 I915_WRITE(PLANE_SIZE(pipe, plane), plane_size);
291
292 /* program plane scaler */
293 if (scaler_id >= 0) {
294 uint32_t ps_ctrl = 0;
295
296 DRM_DEBUG_KMS("plane = %d PS_PLANE_SEL(plane) = 0x%x\n", plane,
297 PS_PLANE_SEL(plane));
298 ps_ctrl = PS_SCALER_EN | PS_PLANE_SEL(plane) |
299 crtc_state->scaler_state.scalers[scaler_id].mode;
300 I915_WRITE(SKL_PS_CTRL(pipe, scaler_id), ps_ctrl);
301 I915_WRITE(SKL_PS_PWR_GATE(pipe, scaler_id), 0);
302 I915_WRITE(SKL_PS_WIN_POS(pipe, scaler_id), (crtc_x << 16) | crtc_y);
303 I915_WRITE(SKL_PS_WIN_SZ(pipe, scaler_id),
304 ((crtc_w + 1) << 16)|(crtc_h + 1));
305
306 I915_WRITE(PLANE_POS(pipe, plane), 0);
307 } else {
308 I915_WRITE(PLANE_POS(pipe, plane), (crtc_y << 16) | crtc_x);
309 }
310
311 I915_WRITE(PLANE_CTL(pipe, plane), plane_ctl);
312 I915_WRITE(PLANE_SURF(pipe, plane), surf_addr);
313 POSTING_READ(PLANE_SURF(pipe, plane));
314}
315
316static void
317skl_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *dplane, struct drm_crtc *crtc)
318{
319 struct drm_device *dev = dplane->dev;
320 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
321 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(dplane);
322 const int pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
323 const int plane = intel_plane->plane + 1;
324
325 I915_WRITE(PLANE_CTL(pipe, plane), 0);
326
327 I915_WRITE(PLANE_SURF(pipe, plane), 0);
328 POSTING_READ(PLANE_SURF(pipe, plane));
329
330 intel_update_sprite_watermarks(dplane, crtc, 0, 0, 0, false, false);
331}
332
333static void
334chv_update_csc(struct intel_plane *intel_plane, uint32_t format)
335{
336 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = intel_plane->base.dev->dev_private;
337 int plane = intel_plane->plane;
338
339 /* Seems RGB data bypasses the CSC always */
340 if (!format_is_yuv(format))
341 return;
342
343 /*
344 * BT.601 limited range YCbCr -> full range RGB
345 *
346 * |r| | 6537 4769 0| |cr |
347 * |g| = |-3330 4769 -1605| x |y-64|
348 * |b| | 0 4769 8263| |cb |
349 *
350 * Cb and Cr apparently come in as signed already, so no
351 * need for any offset. For Y we need to remove the offset.
352 */
353 I915_WRITE(SPCSCYGOFF(plane), SPCSC_OOFF(0) | SPCSC_IOFF(-64));
354 I915_WRITE(SPCSCCBOFF(plane), SPCSC_OOFF(0) | SPCSC_IOFF(0));
355 I915_WRITE(SPCSCCROFF(plane), SPCSC_OOFF(0) | SPCSC_IOFF(0));
356
357 I915_WRITE(SPCSCC01(plane), SPCSC_C1(4769) | SPCSC_C0(6537));
358 I915_WRITE(SPCSCC23(plane), SPCSC_C1(-3330) | SPCSC_C0(0));
359 I915_WRITE(SPCSCC45(plane), SPCSC_C1(-1605) | SPCSC_C0(4769));
360 I915_WRITE(SPCSCC67(plane), SPCSC_C1(4769) | SPCSC_C0(0));
361 I915_WRITE(SPCSCC8(plane), SPCSC_C0(8263));
362
363 I915_WRITE(SPCSCYGICLAMP(plane), SPCSC_IMAX(940) | SPCSC_IMIN(64));
364 I915_WRITE(SPCSCCBICLAMP(plane), SPCSC_IMAX(448) | SPCSC_IMIN(-448));
365 I915_WRITE(SPCSCCRICLAMP(plane), SPCSC_IMAX(448) | SPCSC_IMIN(-448));
366
367 I915_WRITE(SPCSCYGOCLAMP(plane), SPCSC_OMAX(1023) | SPCSC_OMIN(0));
368 I915_WRITE(SPCSCCBOCLAMP(plane), SPCSC_OMAX(1023) | SPCSC_OMIN(0));
369 I915_WRITE(SPCSCCROCLAMP(plane), SPCSC_OMAX(1023) | SPCSC_OMIN(0));
370}
371
372static void
373vlv_update_plane(struct drm_plane *dplane, struct drm_crtc *crtc,
374 struct drm_framebuffer *fb,
375 int crtc_x, int crtc_y,
376 unsigned int crtc_w, unsigned int crtc_h,
377 uint32_t x, uint32_t y,
378 uint32_t src_w, uint32_t src_h)
379{
380 struct drm_device *dev = dplane->dev;
381 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
382 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(dplane);
383 struct drm_i915_gem_object *obj = intel_fb_obj(fb);
384 int pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
385 int plane = intel_plane->plane;
386 u32 sprctl;
387 unsigned long sprsurf_offset, linear_offset;
388 int pixel_size = drm_format_plane_cpp(fb->pixel_format, 0);
389 const struct drm_intel_sprite_colorkey *key =
390 &to_intel_plane_state(dplane->state)->ckey;
391
392 sprctl = SP_ENABLE;
393
394 switch (fb->pixel_format) {
395 case DRM_FORMAT_YUYV:
396 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_YUV422 | SP_YUV_ORDER_YUYV;
397 break;
398 case DRM_FORMAT_YVYU:
399 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_YUV422 | SP_YUV_ORDER_YVYU;
400 break;
401 case DRM_FORMAT_UYVY:
402 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_YUV422 | SP_YUV_ORDER_UYVY;
403 break;
404 case DRM_FORMAT_VYUY:
405 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_YUV422 | SP_YUV_ORDER_VYUY;
406 break;
407 case DRM_FORMAT_RGB565:
408 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_BGR565;
409 break;
410 case DRM_FORMAT_XRGB8888:
411 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_BGRX8888;
412 break;
413 case DRM_FORMAT_ARGB8888:
414 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_BGRA8888;
415 break;
416 case DRM_FORMAT_XBGR2101010:
417 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_RGBX1010102;
418 break;
419 case DRM_FORMAT_ABGR2101010:
420 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_RGBA1010102;
421 break;
422 case DRM_FORMAT_XBGR8888:
423 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_RGBX8888;
424 break;
425 case DRM_FORMAT_ABGR8888:
426 sprctl |= SP_FORMAT_RGBA8888;
427 break;
428 default:
429 /*
430 * If we get here one of the upper layers failed to filter
431 * out the unsupported plane formats
432 */
433 BUG();
434 break;
435 }
436
437 /*
438 * Enable gamma to match primary/cursor plane behaviour.
439 * FIXME should be user controllable via propertiesa.
440 */
441 sprctl |= SP_GAMMA_ENABLE;
442
443 if (obj->tiling_mode != I915_TILING_NONE)
444 sprctl |= SP_TILED;
445
446 /* Sizes are 0 based */
447 src_w--;
448 src_h--;
449 crtc_w--;
450 crtc_h--;
451
452 linear_offset = y * fb->pitches[0] + x * pixel_size;
453 sprsurf_offset = intel_gen4_compute_page_offset(dev_priv,
454 &x, &y,
455 obj->tiling_mode,
456 pixel_size,
457 fb->pitches[0]);
458 linear_offset -= sprsurf_offset;
459
460 if (dplane->state->rotation == BIT(DRM_ROTATE_180)) {
461 sprctl |= SP_ROTATE_180;
462
463 x += src_w;
464 y += src_h;
465 linear_offset += src_h * fb->pitches[0] + src_w * pixel_size;
466 }
467
468 if (key->flags) {
469 I915_WRITE(SPKEYMINVAL(pipe, plane), key->min_value);
470 I915_WRITE(SPKEYMAXVAL(pipe, plane), key->max_value);
471 I915_WRITE(SPKEYMSK(pipe, plane), key->channel_mask);
472 }
473
474 if (key->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_SOURCE)
475 sprctl |= SP_SOURCE_KEY;
476
477 if (IS_CHERRYVIEW(dev) && pipe == PIPE_B)
478 chv_update_csc(intel_plane, fb->pixel_format);
479
480 I915_WRITE(SPSTRIDE(pipe, plane), fb->pitches[0]);
481 I915_WRITE(SPPOS(pipe, plane), (crtc_y << 16) | crtc_x);
482
483 if (obj->tiling_mode != I915_TILING_NONE)
484 I915_WRITE(SPTILEOFF(pipe, plane), (y << 16) | x);
485 else
486 I915_WRITE(SPLINOFF(pipe, plane), linear_offset);
487
488 I915_WRITE(SPCONSTALPHA(pipe, plane), 0);
489
490 I915_WRITE(SPSIZE(pipe, plane), (crtc_h << 16) | crtc_w);
491 I915_WRITE(SPCNTR(pipe, plane), sprctl);
492 I915_WRITE(SPSURF(pipe, plane), i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(obj) +
493 sprsurf_offset);
494 POSTING_READ(SPSURF(pipe, plane));
495}
496
497static void
498vlv_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *dplane, struct drm_crtc *crtc)
499{
500 struct drm_device *dev = dplane->dev;
501 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
502 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(dplane);
503 int pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
504 int plane = intel_plane->plane;
505
506 I915_WRITE(SPCNTR(pipe, plane), 0);
507
508 I915_WRITE(SPSURF(pipe, plane), 0);
509 POSTING_READ(SPSURF(pipe, plane));
510}
511
512static void
513ivb_update_plane(struct drm_plane *plane, struct drm_crtc *crtc,
514 struct drm_framebuffer *fb,
515 int crtc_x, int crtc_y,
516 unsigned int crtc_w, unsigned int crtc_h,
517 uint32_t x, uint32_t y,
518 uint32_t src_w, uint32_t src_h)
519{
520 struct drm_device *dev = plane->dev;
521 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
522 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(plane);
523 struct drm_i915_gem_object *obj = intel_fb_obj(fb);
524 enum i915_pipe pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
525 u32 sprctl, sprscale = 0;
526 unsigned long sprsurf_offset, linear_offset;
527 int pixel_size = drm_format_plane_cpp(fb->pixel_format, 0);
528 const struct drm_intel_sprite_colorkey *key =
529 &to_intel_plane_state(plane->state)->ckey;
530
531 sprctl = SPRITE_ENABLE;
532
533 switch (fb->pixel_format) {
534 case DRM_FORMAT_XBGR8888:
535 sprctl |= SPRITE_FORMAT_RGBX888 | SPRITE_RGB_ORDER_RGBX;
536 break;
537 case DRM_FORMAT_XRGB8888:
538 sprctl |= SPRITE_FORMAT_RGBX888;
539 break;
540 case DRM_FORMAT_YUYV:
541 sprctl |= SPRITE_FORMAT_YUV422 | SPRITE_YUV_ORDER_YUYV;
542 break;
543 case DRM_FORMAT_YVYU:
544 sprctl |= SPRITE_FORMAT_YUV422 | SPRITE_YUV_ORDER_YVYU;
545 break;
546 case DRM_FORMAT_UYVY:
547 sprctl |= SPRITE_FORMAT_YUV422 | SPRITE_YUV_ORDER_UYVY;
548 break;
549 case DRM_FORMAT_VYUY:
550 sprctl |= SPRITE_FORMAT_YUV422 | SPRITE_YUV_ORDER_VYUY;
551 break;
552 default:
553 BUG();
554 }
555
556 /*
557 * Enable gamma to match primary/cursor plane behaviour.
558 * FIXME should be user controllable via propertiesa.
559 */
560 sprctl |= SPRITE_GAMMA_ENABLE;
561
562 if (obj->tiling_mode != I915_TILING_NONE)
563 sprctl |= SPRITE_TILED;
564
565 if (IS_HASWELL(dev) || IS_BROADWELL(dev))
566 sprctl &= ~SPRITE_TRICKLE_FEED_DISABLE;
567 else
568 sprctl |= SPRITE_TRICKLE_FEED_DISABLE;
569
570 if (IS_HASWELL(dev) || IS_BROADWELL(dev))
571 sprctl |= SPRITE_PIPE_CSC_ENABLE;
572
573 intel_update_sprite_watermarks(plane, crtc, src_w, src_h, pixel_size,
574 true,
575 src_w != crtc_w || src_h != crtc_h);
576
577 /* Sizes are 0 based */
578 src_w--;
579 src_h--;
580 crtc_w--;
581 crtc_h--;
582
583 if (crtc_w != src_w || crtc_h != src_h)
584 sprscale = SPRITE_SCALE_ENABLE | (src_w << 16) | src_h;
585
586 linear_offset = y * fb->pitches[0] + x * pixel_size;
587 sprsurf_offset =
588 intel_gen4_compute_page_offset(dev_priv,
589 &x, &y, obj->tiling_mode,
590 pixel_size, fb->pitches[0]);
591 linear_offset -= sprsurf_offset;
592
593 if (plane->state->rotation == BIT(DRM_ROTATE_180)) {
594 sprctl |= SPRITE_ROTATE_180;
595
596 /* HSW and BDW does this automagically in hardware */
597 if (!IS_HASWELL(dev) && !IS_BROADWELL(dev)) {
598 x += src_w;
599 y += src_h;
600 linear_offset += src_h * fb->pitches[0] +
601 src_w * pixel_size;
602 }
603 }
604
605 if (key->flags) {
606 I915_WRITE(SPRKEYVAL(pipe), key->min_value);
607 I915_WRITE(SPRKEYMAX(pipe), key->max_value);
608 I915_WRITE(SPRKEYMSK(pipe), key->channel_mask);
609 }
610
611 if (key->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_DESTINATION)
612 sprctl |= SPRITE_DEST_KEY;
613 else if (key->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_SOURCE)
614 sprctl |= SPRITE_SOURCE_KEY;
615
616 I915_WRITE(SPRSTRIDE(pipe), fb->pitches[0]);
617 I915_WRITE(SPRPOS(pipe), (crtc_y << 16) | crtc_x);
618
619 /* HSW consolidates SPRTILEOFF and SPRLINOFF into a single SPROFFSET
620 * register */
621 if (IS_HASWELL(dev) || IS_BROADWELL(dev))
622 I915_WRITE(SPROFFSET(pipe), (y << 16) | x);
623 else if (obj->tiling_mode != I915_TILING_NONE)
624 I915_WRITE(SPRTILEOFF(pipe), (y << 16) | x);
625 else
626 I915_WRITE(SPRLINOFF(pipe), linear_offset);
627
628 I915_WRITE(SPRSIZE(pipe), (crtc_h << 16) | crtc_w);
629 if (intel_plane->can_scale)
630 I915_WRITE(SPRSCALE(pipe), sprscale);
631 I915_WRITE(SPRCTL(pipe), sprctl);
632 I915_WRITE(SPRSURF(pipe),
633 i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(obj) + sprsurf_offset);
634 POSTING_READ(SPRSURF(pipe));
635}
636
637static void
638ivb_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *plane, struct drm_crtc *crtc)
639{
640 struct drm_device *dev = plane->dev;
641 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
642 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(plane);
643 int pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
644
645 I915_WRITE(SPRCTL(pipe), 0);
646 /* Can't leave the scaler enabled... */
647 if (intel_plane->can_scale)
648 I915_WRITE(SPRSCALE(pipe), 0);
649
650 I915_WRITE(SPRSURF(pipe), 0);
651 POSTING_READ(SPRSURF(pipe));
652}
653
654static void
655ilk_update_plane(struct drm_plane *plane, struct drm_crtc *crtc,
656 struct drm_framebuffer *fb,
657 int crtc_x, int crtc_y,
658 unsigned int crtc_w, unsigned int crtc_h,
659 uint32_t x, uint32_t y,
660 uint32_t src_w, uint32_t src_h)
661{
662 struct drm_device *dev = plane->dev;
663 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
664 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(plane);
665 struct drm_i915_gem_object *obj = intel_fb_obj(fb);
666 int pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
667 unsigned long dvssurf_offset, linear_offset;
668 u32 dvscntr, dvsscale;
669 int pixel_size = drm_format_plane_cpp(fb->pixel_format, 0);
670 const struct drm_intel_sprite_colorkey *key =
671 &to_intel_plane_state(plane->state)->ckey;
672
673 dvscntr = DVS_ENABLE;
674
675 switch (fb->pixel_format) {
676 case DRM_FORMAT_XBGR8888:
677 dvscntr |= DVS_FORMAT_RGBX888 | DVS_RGB_ORDER_XBGR;
678 break;
679 case DRM_FORMAT_XRGB8888:
680 dvscntr |= DVS_FORMAT_RGBX888;
681 break;
682 case DRM_FORMAT_YUYV:
683 dvscntr |= DVS_FORMAT_YUV422 | DVS_YUV_ORDER_YUYV;
684 break;
685 case DRM_FORMAT_YVYU:
686 dvscntr |= DVS_FORMAT_YUV422 | DVS_YUV_ORDER_YVYU;
687 break;
688 case DRM_FORMAT_UYVY:
689 dvscntr |= DVS_FORMAT_YUV422 | DVS_YUV_ORDER_UYVY;
690 break;
691 case DRM_FORMAT_VYUY:
692 dvscntr |= DVS_FORMAT_YUV422 | DVS_YUV_ORDER_VYUY;
693 break;
694 default:
695 BUG();
696 }
697
698 /*
699 * Enable gamma to match primary/cursor plane behaviour.
700 * FIXME should be user controllable via propertiesa.
701 */
702 dvscntr |= DVS_GAMMA_ENABLE;
703
704 if (obj->tiling_mode != I915_TILING_NONE)
705 dvscntr |= DVS_TILED;
706
707 if (IS_GEN6(dev))
708 dvscntr |= DVS_TRICKLE_FEED_DISABLE; /* must disable */
709
710 intel_update_sprite_watermarks(plane, crtc, src_w, src_h,
711 pixel_size, true,
712 src_w != crtc_w || src_h != crtc_h);
713
714 /* Sizes are 0 based */
715 src_w--;
716 src_h--;
717 crtc_w--;
718 crtc_h--;
719
720 dvsscale = 0;
721 if (crtc_w != src_w || crtc_h != src_h)
722 dvsscale = DVS_SCALE_ENABLE | (src_w << 16) | src_h;
723
724 linear_offset = y * fb->pitches[0] + x * pixel_size;
725 dvssurf_offset =
726 intel_gen4_compute_page_offset(dev_priv,
727 &x, &y, obj->tiling_mode,
728 pixel_size, fb->pitches[0]);
729 linear_offset -= dvssurf_offset;
730
731 if (plane->state->rotation == BIT(DRM_ROTATE_180)) {
732 dvscntr |= DVS_ROTATE_180;
733
734 x += src_w;
735 y += src_h;
736 linear_offset += src_h * fb->pitches[0] + src_w * pixel_size;
737 }
738
739 if (key->flags) {
740 I915_WRITE(DVSKEYVAL(pipe), key->min_value);
741 I915_WRITE(DVSKEYMAX(pipe), key->max_value);
742 I915_WRITE(DVSKEYMSK(pipe), key->channel_mask);
743 }
744
745 if (key->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_DESTINATION)
746 dvscntr |= DVS_DEST_KEY;
747 else if (key->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_SOURCE)
748 dvscntr |= DVS_SOURCE_KEY;
749
750 I915_WRITE(DVSSTRIDE(pipe), fb->pitches[0]);
751 I915_WRITE(DVSPOS(pipe), (crtc_y << 16) | crtc_x);
752
753 if (obj->tiling_mode != I915_TILING_NONE)
754 I915_WRITE(DVSTILEOFF(pipe), (y << 16) | x);
755 else
756 I915_WRITE(DVSLINOFF(pipe), linear_offset);
757
758 I915_WRITE(DVSSIZE(pipe), (crtc_h << 16) | crtc_w);
759 I915_WRITE(DVSSCALE(pipe), dvsscale);
760 I915_WRITE(DVSCNTR(pipe), dvscntr);
761 I915_WRITE(DVSSURF(pipe),
762 i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(obj) + dvssurf_offset);
763 POSTING_READ(DVSSURF(pipe));
764}
765
766static void
767ilk_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *plane, struct drm_crtc *crtc)
768{
769 struct drm_device *dev = plane->dev;
770 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
771 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(plane);
772 int pipe = intel_plane->pipe;
773
774 I915_WRITE(DVSCNTR(pipe), 0);
775 /* Disable the scaler */
776 I915_WRITE(DVSSCALE(pipe), 0);
777
778 I915_WRITE(DVSSURF(pipe), 0);
779 POSTING_READ(DVSSURF(pipe));
780}
781
782static int
783intel_check_sprite_plane(struct drm_plane *plane,
784 struct intel_crtc_state *crtc_state,
785 struct intel_plane_state *state)
786{
787 struct drm_device *dev = plane->dev;
788 struct drm_crtc *crtc = state->base.crtc;
789 struct intel_crtc *intel_crtc = to_intel_crtc(crtc);
790 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(plane);
791 struct drm_framebuffer *fb = state->base.fb;
792 int crtc_x, crtc_y;
793 unsigned int crtc_w, crtc_h;
794 uint32_t src_x, src_y, src_w, src_h;
795 struct drm_rect *src = &state->src;
796 struct drm_rect *dst = &state->dst;
797 const struct drm_rect *clip = &state->clip;
798 int hscale, vscale;
799 int max_scale, min_scale;
800 bool can_scale;
801 int pixel_size;
802
803 if (!fb) {
804 state->visible = false;
805 return 0;
806 }
807
808 /* Don't modify another pipe's plane */
809 if (intel_plane->pipe != intel_crtc->pipe) {
810 DRM_DEBUG_KMS("Wrong plane <-> crtc mapping\n");
811 return -EINVAL;
812 }
813
814 /* FIXME check all gen limits */
815 if (fb->width < 3 || fb->height < 3 || fb->pitches[0] > 16384) {
816 DRM_DEBUG_KMS("Unsuitable framebuffer for plane\n");
817 return -EINVAL;
818 }
819
820 /* setup can_scale, min_scale, max_scale */
821 if (INTEL_INFO(dev)->gen >= 9) {
822 /* use scaler when colorkey is not required */
823 if (state->ckey.flags == I915_SET_COLORKEY_NONE) {
824 can_scale = 1;
825 min_scale = 1;
826 max_scale = skl_max_scale(intel_crtc, crtc_state);
827 } else {
828 can_scale = 0;
829 min_scale = DRM_PLANE_HELPER_NO_SCALING;
830 max_scale = DRM_PLANE_HELPER_NO_SCALING;
831 }
832 } else {
833 can_scale = intel_plane->can_scale;
834 max_scale = intel_plane->max_downscale << 16;
835 min_scale = intel_plane->can_scale ? 1 : (1 << 16);
836 }
837
838 /*
839 * FIXME the following code does a bunch of fuzzy adjustments to the
840 * coordinates and sizes. We probably need some way to decide whether
841 * more strict checking should be done instead.
842 */
843 drm_rect_rotate(src, fb->width << 16, fb->height << 16,
844 state->base.rotation);
845
846 hscale = drm_rect_calc_hscale_relaxed(src, dst, min_scale, max_scale);
847 BUG_ON(hscale < 0);
848
849 vscale = drm_rect_calc_vscale_relaxed(src, dst, min_scale, max_scale);
850 BUG_ON(vscale < 0);
851
852 state->visible = drm_rect_clip_scaled(src, dst, clip, hscale, vscale);
853
854 crtc_x = dst->x1;
855 crtc_y = dst->y1;
856 crtc_w = drm_rect_width(dst);
857 crtc_h = drm_rect_height(dst);
858
859 if (state->visible) {
860 /* check again in case clipping clamped the results */
861 hscale = drm_rect_calc_hscale(src, dst, min_scale, max_scale);
862 if (hscale < 0) {
863 DRM_DEBUG_KMS("Horizontal scaling factor out of limits\n");
864 drm_rect_debug_print(src, true);
865 drm_rect_debug_print(dst, false);
866
867 return hscale;
868 }
869
870 vscale = drm_rect_calc_vscale(src, dst, min_scale, max_scale);
871 if (vscale < 0) {
872 DRM_DEBUG_KMS("Vertical scaling factor out of limits\n");
873 drm_rect_debug_print(src, true);
874 drm_rect_debug_print(dst, false);
875
876 return vscale;
877 }
878
879 /* Make the source viewport size an exact multiple of the scaling factors. */
880 drm_rect_adjust_size(src,
881 drm_rect_width(dst) * hscale - drm_rect_width(src),
882 drm_rect_height(dst) * vscale - drm_rect_height(src));
883
884 drm_rect_rotate_inv(src, fb->width << 16, fb->height << 16,
885 state->base.rotation);
886
887 /* sanity check to make sure the src viewport wasn't enlarged */
888 WARN_ON(src->x1 < (int) state->base.src_x ||
889 src->y1 < (int) state->base.src_y ||
890 src->x2 > (int) state->base.src_x + state->base.src_w ||
891 src->y2 > (int) state->base.src_y + state->base.src_h);
892
893 /*
894 * Hardware doesn't handle subpixel coordinates.
895 * Adjust to (macro)pixel boundary, but be careful not to
896 * increase the source viewport size, because that could
897 * push the downscaling factor out of bounds.
898 */
899 src_x = src->x1 >> 16;
900 src_w = drm_rect_width(src) >> 16;
901 src_y = src->y1 >> 16;
902 src_h = drm_rect_height(src) >> 16;
903
904 if (format_is_yuv(fb->pixel_format)) {
905 src_x &= ~1;
906 src_w &= ~1;
907
908 /*
909 * Must keep src and dst the
910 * same if we can't scale.
911 */
912 if (!can_scale)
913 crtc_w &= ~1;
914
915 if (crtc_w == 0)
916 state->visible = false;
917 }
918 }
919
920 /* Check size restrictions when scaling */
921 if (state->visible && (src_w != crtc_w || src_h != crtc_h)) {
922 unsigned int width_bytes;
923
924 WARN_ON(!can_scale);
925
926 /* FIXME interlacing min height is 6 */
927
928 if (crtc_w < 3 || crtc_h < 3)
929 state->visible = false;
930
931 if (src_w < 3 || src_h < 3)
932 state->visible = false;
933
934 pixel_size = drm_format_plane_cpp(fb->pixel_format, 0);
935 width_bytes = ((src_x * pixel_size) & 63) +
936 src_w * pixel_size;
937
938 if (INTEL_INFO(dev)->gen < 9 && (src_w > 2048 || src_h > 2048 ||
939 width_bytes > 4096 || fb->pitches[0] > 4096)) {
940 DRM_DEBUG_KMS("Source dimensions exceed hardware limits\n");
941 return -EINVAL;
942 }
943 }
944
945 if (state->visible) {
946 src->x1 = src_x << 16;
947 src->x2 = (src_x + src_w) << 16;
948 src->y1 = src_y << 16;
949 src->y2 = (src_y + src_h) << 16;
950 }
951
952 dst->x1 = crtc_x;
953 dst->x2 = crtc_x + crtc_w;
954 dst->y1 = crtc_y;
955 dst->y2 = crtc_y + crtc_h;
956
957 return 0;
958}
959
960static void
961intel_commit_sprite_plane(struct drm_plane *plane,
962 struct intel_plane_state *state)
963{
964 struct drm_crtc *crtc = state->base.crtc;
965 struct intel_plane *intel_plane = to_intel_plane(plane);
966 struct drm_framebuffer *fb = state->base.fb;
967
968 crtc = crtc ? crtc : plane->crtc;
969
970 if (!crtc->state->active)
971 return;
972
973 if (state->visible) {
974 intel_plane->update_plane(plane, crtc, fb,
975 state->dst.x1, state->dst.y1,
976 drm_rect_width(&state->dst),
977 drm_rect_height(&state->dst),
978 state->src.x1 >> 16,
979 state->src.y1 >> 16,
980 drm_rect_width(&state->src) >> 16,
981 drm_rect_height(&state->src) >> 16);
982 } else {
983 intel_plane->disable_plane(plane, crtc);
984 }
985}
986
987int intel_sprite_set_colorkey(struct drm_device *dev, void *data,
988 struct drm_file *file_priv)
989{
990 struct drm_intel_sprite_colorkey *set = data;
991 struct drm_plane *plane;
992 struct drm_plane_state *plane_state;
993 struct drm_atomic_state *state;
994 struct drm_modeset_acquire_ctx ctx;
995 int ret = 0;
996
997 /* Make sure we don't try to enable both src & dest simultaneously */
998 if ((set->flags & (I915_SET_COLORKEY_DESTINATION | I915_SET_COLORKEY_SOURCE)) == (I915_SET_COLORKEY_DESTINATION | I915_SET_COLORKEY_SOURCE))
999 return -EINVAL;
1000
1001 if (IS_VALLEYVIEW(dev) &&
1002 set->flags & I915_SET_COLORKEY_DESTINATION)
1003 return -EINVAL;
1004
1005 plane = drm_plane_find(dev, set->plane_id);
1006 if (!plane || plane->type != DRM_PLANE_TYPE_OVERLAY)
1007 return -ENOENT;
1008
1009 drm_modeset_acquire_init(&ctx, 0);
1010
1011 state = drm_atomic_state_alloc(plane->dev);
1012 if (!state) {
1013 ret = -ENOMEM;
1014 goto out;
1015 }
1016 state->acquire_ctx = &ctx;
1017
1018 while (1) {
1019 plane_state = drm_atomic_get_plane_state(state, plane);
1020 ret = PTR_ERR_OR_ZERO(plane_state);
1021 if (!ret) {
1022 to_intel_plane_state(plane_state)->ckey = *set;
1023 ret = drm_atomic_commit(state);
1024 }
1025
1026 if (ret != -EDEADLK)
1027 break;
1028
1029 drm_atomic_state_clear(state);
1030 drm_modeset_backoff(&ctx);
1031 }
1032
1033 if (ret)
1034 drm_atomic_state_free(state);
1035
1036out:
1037 drm_modeset_drop_locks(&ctx);
1038 drm_modeset_acquire_fini(&ctx);
1039 return ret;
1040}
1041
1042static const uint32_t ilk_plane_formats[] = {
1043 DRM_FORMAT_XRGB8888,
1044 DRM_FORMAT_YUYV,
1045 DRM_FORMAT_YVYU,
1046 DRM_FORMAT_UYVY,
1047 DRM_FORMAT_VYUY,
1048};
1049
1050static const uint32_t snb_plane_formats[] = {
1051 DRM_FORMAT_XBGR8888,
1052 DRM_FORMAT_XRGB8888,
1053 DRM_FORMAT_YUYV,
1054 DRM_FORMAT_YVYU,
1055 DRM_FORMAT_UYVY,
1056 DRM_FORMAT_VYUY,
1057};
1058
1059static const uint32_t vlv_plane_formats[] = {
1060 DRM_FORMAT_RGB565,
1061 DRM_FORMAT_ABGR8888,
1062 DRM_FORMAT_ARGB8888,
1063 DRM_FORMAT_XBGR8888,
1064 DRM_FORMAT_XRGB8888,
1065 DRM_FORMAT_XBGR2101010,
1066 DRM_FORMAT_ABGR2101010,
1067 DRM_FORMAT_YUYV,
1068 DRM_FORMAT_YVYU,
1069 DRM_FORMAT_UYVY,
1070 DRM_FORMAT_VYUY,
1071};
1072
1073static uint32_t skl_plane_formats[] = {
1074 DRM_FORMAT_RGB565,
1075 DRM_FORMAT_ABGR8888,
1076 DRM_FORMAT_ARGB8888,
1077 DRM_FORMAT_XBGR8888,
1078 DRM_FORMAT_XRGB8888,
1079 DRM_FORMAT_YUYV,
1080 DRM_FORMAT_YVYU,
1081 DRM_FORMAT_UYVY,
1082 DRM_FORMAT_VYUY,
1083};
1084
1085int
1086intel_plane_init(struct drm_device *dev, enum i915_pipe pipe, int plane)
1087{
1088 struct intel_plane *intel_plane;
1089 struct intel_plane_state *state;
1090 unsigned long possible_crtcs;
1091 const uint32_t *plane_formats;
1092 int num_plane_formats;
1093 int ret;
1094
1095 if (INTEL_INFO(dev)->gen < 5)
1096 return -ENODEV;
1097
1098 intel_plane = kzalloc(sizeof(*intel_plane), GFP_KERNEL);
1099 if (!intel_plane)
1100 return -ENOMEM;
1101
1102 state = intel_create_plane_state(&intel_plane->base);
1103 if (!state) {
1104 kfree(intel_plane);
1105 return -ENOMEM;
1106 }
1107 intel_plane->base.state = &state->base;
1108
1109 switch (INTEL_INFO(dev)->gen) {
1110 case 5:
1111 case 6:
1112 intel_plane->can_scale = true;
1113 intel_plane->max_downscale = 16;
1114 intel_plane->update_plane = ilk_update_plane;
1115 intel_plane->disable_plane = ilk_disable_plane;
1116
1117 if (IS_GEN6(dev)) {
1118 plane_formats = snb_plane_formats;
1119 num_plane_formats = ARRAY_SIZE(snb_plane_formats);
1120 } else {
1121 plane_formats = ilk_plane_formats;
1122 num_plane_formats = ARRAY_SIZE(ilk_plane_formats);
1123 }
1124 break;
1125
1126 case 7:
1127 case 8:
1128 if (IS_IVYBRIDGE(dev)) {
1129 intel_plane->can_scale = true;
1130 intel_plane->max_downscale = 2;
1131 } else {
1132 intel_plane->can_scale = false;
1133 intel_plane->max_downscale = 1;
1134 }
1135
1136 if (IS_VALLEYVIEW(dev)) {
1137 intel_plane->update_plane = vlv_update_plane;
1138 intel_plane->disable_plane = vlv_disable_plane;
1139
1140 plane_formats = vlv_plane_formats;
1141 num_plane_formats = ARRAY_SIZE(vlv_plane_formats);
1142 } else {
1143 intel_plane->update_plane = ivb_update_plane;
1144 intel_plane->disable_plane = ivb_disable_plane;
1145
1146 plane_formats = snb_plane_formats;
1147 num_plane_formats = ARRAY_SIZE(snb_plane_formats);
1148 }
1149 break;
1150 case 9:
1151 intel_plane->can_scale = true;
1152 intel_plane->update_plane = skl_update_plane;
1153 intel_plane->disable_plane = skl_disable_plane;
1154 state->scaler_id = -1;
1155
1156 plane_formats = skl_plane_formats;
1157 num_plane_formats = ARRAY_SIZE(skl_plane_formats);
1158 break;
1159 default:
1160 kfree(intel_plane);
1161 return -ENODEV;
1162 }
1163
1164 intel_plane->pipe = pipe;
1165 intel_plane->plane = plane;
1166 intel_plane->frontbuffer_bit = INTEL_FRONTBUFFER_SPRITE(pipe, plane);
1167 intel_plane->check_plane = intel_check_sprite_plane;
1168 intel_plane->commit_plane = intel_commit_sprite_plane;
1169 possible_crtcs = (1 << pipe);
1170 ret = drm_universal_plane_init(dev, &intel_plane->base, possible_crtcs,
1171 &intel_plane_funcs,
1172 plane_formats, num_plane_formats,
1173 DRM_PLANE_TYPE_OVERLAY);
1174 if (ret) {
1175 kfree(intel_plane);
1176 goto out;
1177 }
1178
1179 intel_create_rotation_property(dev, intel_plane);
1180
1181 drm_plane_helper_add(&intel_plane->base, &intel_plane_helper_funcs);
1182
1183out:
1184 return ret;
1185}
